title: Titici Vento light, flat tube carbon road bike gets aero, and new integrated Titici bar
content:
Titici’s already light climber’s road bike gets a bit of fresh aero integration in the new 60th anniversary Vento, making for a custom Italian carbon road bike that’s quick both up and down the mountain. The made-to-measure Titici Vento combines classic round tube shapes with their unique vibration-eating PAT ultra-flat toptube, and now gets an […]

The post Titici Vento light, flat tube carbon road bike gets aero, and new integrated Titici bar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
